result.title: Runtime error
result.content:
Im getting run time error (exit code: -1073741819) for the input Iy^.,Aw*,5+f;l@Q;jLK'G5H-r1Pfmx?ei~`CjMmUe{K:lS9cu4ay8rqRh-W?Gqv!e-j*U)!Mzn{E8B6%aSZ~iQ_QwlC9_cX(o8

Problem code: 133A Compiler: GNU C++11 Please help

include

include

int main() { char a[100]; int i;

std::cin.getline(a, 101);

for( i=0;i<strlen(a);i++)
{
    if(a[i] == 'H' || a[i] == 'Q' || a[i] == '9')
    {
        break;
    }
}

if(i < strlen(a))
    std::cout<<"YES";

else
    std::cout<<"NO";

return 0;

}
